name: A ninja in time
description:
ATTN. I can't upload the missing files before the game jam is over so please download them from here https://drive.google.com/file/d/1A_7JV38Nop3BcF35cTQFY4mOOKmQ3sVi/view?usp=sharing

A ninja has his time machine stolen and has to get it back. 

Made for Brackeys game jam 2020.2
